name: C. Good Array
statement:
Let’s call an array if there is an element in the array that equals to
the sum of all other elements. For example, the array a=[1, 3, 3, 7] is
good because there is the element a_4=7 which equals to the sum 1 + 3 +
3.You are given an array a consisting of n integers. Your task is to
print all indices j of this array such that after removing the j-th
element from the array it will be (let’s call such indices ).For
example, if a=[8, 3, 5, 2], the indices are 1 and 4: if you remove a_1,
the array will look like [3, 5, 2] and it is ; if you remove a_4, the
array will look like [8, 3, 5] and it is . You have to consider all
removals , i. e. remove the element, check if the resulting array is ,
and return the element into the array.
